import java.util.Scanner;

class Sniper {
	
	static int gcd(int a, int b)
	{
		if(b==0)
			return a;
		return gcd(b, a%b);
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		int t=sc.nextInt();
		while(t-- > 0)
		{
			int x1=sc.nextInt();
			int y1=sc.nextInt();
			int x2=sc.nextInt();
			int y2=sc.nextInt();
			int row=Math.abs(x2-x1);
			int col=Math.abs(y2-y1);
			if(row==col)
			{
				System.out.println(row);
				continue;
			}
			if(row==0 || col==0)
			{
				System.out.println(0);
				continue;
			}
					
					
			System.out.println(row + col-gcd(row, col));
			
			
		}
			sc.close();

	}

}
